snippet.title: Minecraft x Dungeons & Dragons DLC
snippet.description:
Experience a dramatic tale with Minecraft’s Dungeons & Dragons DLC. Explore iconic locations in the Forgotten Realms like Icewind Dale and Candlekeep, battling Beholders, Mimics, and more. Choose your class, unlock classic spells, and ace ability checks to escape sticky situations. Your adventure awaits!

Get the Minecraft x Dungeons & Dragons DLC here:
https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=a090b3f1-ff54-44d1-b326-6b261977e710

Not available for Nintendo Switch and Sony PlayStation.

We want to ensure that the content we deliver to you, our community, is the best it can be across all Minecraft: Bedrock Edition platforms. With this in mind, we are unable to deliver the Dungeons & Dragons DLC to the Nintendo Switch system and Sony PlayStation at this time. Additionally, 6gb RAM or greater is required on mobile for the best experience. Please check official Minecraft channels for any further updates.
